content:
We plan to post something about async-await hitting stable -- I've written up a first draft at the blog post here in this gist. Take a look and feel free to leave comments here -- or hold up, as I'll probably open a PR against blog.rust-lang.org soon :)

cc @simulacrum

Maybe a thank you to all the community for their engagement - we maybe got too much feedback on a 'certain' topic but better too much than too little. It's a cathartic moment given how much we've all wanted this day to come to fruition. Well done all involved.
i'm also working on one for the futures-rs 0.3 release
The more the merrier! I shall certainly be sinking a few in honor of async/await landing at the convinently timed #RustFest in Barcelona.
We at least timed it to hit one of the conferences :-)
